column4: in ubuntu 8 the command "sudo displayconfig-gtk" worked is there a same command in 10.10??
why does that need sudo? also don't run gui apps with sudo, use gksudo
also, 'ubuntu 8' doesn't exist. There is 8.04 (hardy) and 8.10 (intrepid, which is EOL)
and hardy on desktop is EOL when Natty is released
